question:
[Thomas] took his son [Matthew] to the park to feed the squirrels. [Norman] took his nephew [Matthew] to the hockey game. [Helen]'s husband, [Johnny], surprised her with tickets to a football game for their anniversary. [Helen] enjoys playing cards with her brother. His name is [Norman]. [Johnny] took his son [Leo] to the park to feed the squirrels. [Kent] bought a steak dinner for himself and his brother [Thomas].
Question: How is [Leo] related to [Kent]?

- Since [Johnny] is the father of [Leo], and [Helen] is married to [Johnny], [Leo] is [Helen]'s son
- Since [Kent] is the brother of [Thomas], and [Thomas] is the father of [Matthew], [Kent] is [Matthew]'s uncle

- Since [Leo] is [Johnny]'s son and [Matthew] is [Johnny]'s son, [Leo] and [Matthew] are brothers
- Therefore, [Leo] is the nephew of [Kent]

- Based on the relationships identified, [Leo] is the nephew of [Kent]
